link.mongo
==========

**link.mongo** is a MongoDB driver for **link.dbrequest** query system.

See documentation_ for more informations.

.. _documentation: https://linkmongo.readthedocs.io

Installation
------------

.. code-block:: text

   pip install link.mongo
